content: 11262 86th avenue north maple grove mn 55369 763 391 7700 www amazing-threads com fixation baby hat by bobbi kreb fixation knits up into the perfect little baby hat the stretch in the fabric lightly hugs the head this easy rolled brim hat can be made longer to grow with the baby materials yarn 1 skeins fixation 98 3% cotton 1 7% elastic 100 yards 50 grams needles/tools 12 circular and double point needles us #5 or size necessary to obtain gauge stitch marker darning needle size newborn to 3 months/6 months gauge 6 stitches = 1 inch in stockinette stitch gauge is flexible due to elasticity of yarn directions with smaller circular needle cast on 72 80 sts place marker and join in round being careful not to twist sts work in stockinette knit all sts when working in the round until hat measures 4 4 5 from cast on edge decrease for crown change to dpns as needed row 1 * k6 7 k2tog * continue around row 2 knit row 3 *k5 6 k2tog* continue around row 4 knit row 5 *k4 5 k2tog* continue around row 6 knit row 7 *k3 4 k2tog* continue around row 8 knit row 9 *k2 3 k2tog* continue around row 10 knit row 11 *k1 2 k2tog* continue around row 12 k2 together around until 3 sts remain on needle knit a 2 1/2 i-cord with remaining 3 sts check the video at http //www purlbee com/2006/09/29/i-cord/ for instructions bind off and pull yarn through last stitch weave in end from top knot and tie i-cord into a knot weave in ends copyright ©2015 amazing threads all rights reserved reproduction of this pattern without permission from author is prohibited at104/03/15
